Sentencas: The structure and oxygen stoichiometry of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.5Fe0.5O3-delta (BSCF) between 793 K and 1100 K at an oxygen partial pressure of 0.1 atm were determined by in-situ neutron diffraction.
Titulo: Evidence for the low oxygen stoichiometry of cubic Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.5Fe0.5O3-δ from in-situ neutron diffraction

Sentencas: Additional analysis at room temperature was conducted by synchrotron X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Evidence for the low oxygen stoichiometry of cubic Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.5Fe0.5O3-δ from in-situ neutron diffraction

Sentencas: BSCF has the cubic perovskite structure, space group Pm (3) over barn, for all investigated temperatures.
Titulo: Evidence for the low oxygen stoichiometry of cubic Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.5Fe0.5O3-δ from in-situ neutron diffraction

Sentencas: The oxygen stoichiometry ranged from 226 (2) at 1100 K to 2.36 (2) at 793 K.
Titulo: Evidence for the low oxygen stoichiometry of cubic Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.5Fe0.5O3-δ from in-situ neutron diffraction

Sentencas: The formation of secondary phases during long equilibration periods is suggested to be responsible for the discrepancy between oxygen stoichiometry values determined by neutron diffraction and those determined by thermogravimetry for this class of materials.
Titulo: Evidence for the low oxygen stoichiometry of cubic Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.5Fe0.5O3-δ from in-situ neutron diffraction
